extendedInfo.description: Quick and easy access to the latest state lottery results in the US. Features include jackpot information and drawing history plus prize level/payout information (for fixed prizes). This is a free app with ad-supported.Lottery results and jackpot information for Mega Millions, Powerball, Hot Lotto, Wild Card 2, 2by2, Decades of Dollars, Win for Life and state lottery games: * Arizona (The Pick,  Fantasy 5 (Pick 5), Weekly Winnings, 2by2, Pick 3)* Arkansas (Cash 4, Cash 3, Natural State Jackpot)* California (SuperLOTTO Plus, Fantasy 5, Daily 4, Daily 3, Daily Derby)* Colorado (Lotto, Cash 5, Pick 3)* Connecticut (Classic Lotto, Cash5, Play3, Play4, Lucky for Life)* Delaware (Multi-Win Lotto, Cash 5, Play4, Play3)* District of Columbia (DC-5, DC-4, DC-3)* Florida (Florida Lotto, Mega Money, FANTASY 5, PLAY 4, CASH 3)* Georgia (Decades of Dollars, Win For Life, Fantasy 5, Georgia FIVE, Cash 3, Cash 4)* Idaho (Wild Card 2, Weekly Grand, Pick 3)* Illinois (Lotto, Lucky Day Lotto, Pick 3, Pick 4, My3)* Indiana (Hoosier Lotto, Poker Lotto, Mix & Match, Lucky 5, Daily 4, Daily 3, Quick Draw)* Iowa ($100,000 Cash Game, Pick 4, Pick 3)* Kansas (Super Kansas Cash, Pick 3)* Kentucky (Decades of Dollars, Pick 3, Pick 4, Cash Ball, 5 Card Cash)* Louisiana (Lotto, Easy 5, Pick 4, Pick 3)* Maine (Tri-State MegaBucks Plus, Tri-State Gimme 5, Tri-State Pick 4, Tri-State Pick 3, Lucky for Life) * Maryland (Multi-Match, 5 Card Cash, Bonus Match 5, Pick 4, Pick 3)* Massachusetts (Megabucks Doubler, MASS CASH, Numbers Game, Lucky for Life)* Michigan (Classic Lotto 47, Fantasy 5, Daily 3, Daily 4, Keno!)* Minnesota (Gopher 5, Northstar Cash, Daily 3)* Missouri (Lotto, Show Me Cash, Pick 3, Pick 4)* Montana (Montana Cash,10 Spot)* Nebraska (Pick 5, Pick 3, MyDaY)* New Hampshire (Tri-State MegaBucks Plus, Tri-State Gimme 5, Tri-State Pick 4, Tri-State Pick 3, Lucky for Life)* New Jersey (Pick-6 Lotto, Jersey Cash 5, Pick-4, Pick-3)* New Mexico (Roadrunner Cash, Pick 3)* New York (New York Lotto, Pick 10, Take 5, Sweet Million, WIN 4, NUMBERS)* North Carolina (Carolina Pick 3, Carolina Pick 4, Carolina Cash 5)* North Dakota (Wild Card 2, 2by2)* Ohio (Classic Lotto, Rolling Cash 5, Pick 3, Pick 4, Pick 5)* Oklahoma (Cash 5, Pick 4, Pick 3)* Oregon (Megabucks, Win for Life, Pick 4, Lucky Lines)* Pennsylvania (MATCH 6, The Daily Number, BIG 4, Quinto, CASH 5, Treasure Hunt)* Rhode Island (Wild Money, The Numbers Game, Lucky for Life)* South Carolina (Carolina Cash 6, Palmetto Cash 5, Pick 4, Pick 3)* South Dakota (Wild Card 2, Dakota Cash)* Tennessee (Tennessee Cash, Cash 4, Cash 3)* Texas (Lotto Texas, Texas Two Step, Cash Five, Daily 4, Pick 3, All or Nothing)* Vermont (Tri-State MegaBucks Plus, Tri-State Gimme 5, Tri-State Pick 4, Tri-State Pick 3, Lucky for Life)* Virginia (Decades of Dollars, Win For Life, Cash 5, Pick 4, Pick 3)* Washington (Lotto, Hit 5, Match 4, The Daily Game, Daily Keno)* West Virginia (Cash 25, Daily 4, Daily 3)* Wisconsin (Megabucks, SuperCash!, Badger 5, Pick 4, Pick 3)INSTRUCTIONS* To view drawing history, tap on lottery game's Current Winning Numbers section* To view payout/prize level information, tap on lottery game's Next Drawing section* To change to another lottery state, tap on Options Menu  then select Set Location* To select/deselect lotto games to display, tap on Options Menu then select Select Games* To refresh/update lottery data, tap on Options Menu then select RefreshSearch "my lottos" for other lottery apps from My Lottos.Attention T-Mobile Users: If you can't get lottery updates over 3G/4G connection, please check your Web Guard settings. For more information regarding Web Guard, go to http://support.t-mobile.com/docs/DOC-2144.

reviews.title: Just gotA put up with the adds....
reviews.comment: Loads quicker then \"Local\" Lottery sight, usually has recently  drawings before local to, & updates of if anyone\"Hit The Big One\".... or if it\'s still up fro grabs....
reviews.author: Ed P.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Best lottery results app out in my opinion. Posts results quick, always accurate.
reviews.author: Franklin Saxton

reviews.title: Easy to use. Fast results!
reviews.comment: Easy to view timely game results. Enjoy option to view each game rules and historical recent drawn numbers.
reviews.author: Gus Moyer

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: Only reason it didn\'t get a 5 is because it should let people who play one number all the time get alerts if that numbet comes out.
reviews.author: Tracy Brooks

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: Loads and refreshes fast. Never had an issue with this app and I hope that continues.
reviews.author: Steve Conyers

reviews.title: Long wished for...
reviews.comment: I always wanted to know the lottery results,and if someone had won or was the amount still climbing. I was so happy when I found this app. If your a lottery player as I am,this is the best app going trust me EXCELLENT!
reviews.author: April Thomas

reviews.title: One of the best apps
reviews.comment: You need this one if you play
reviews.author: Donald Hoffmann

reviews.title: Very nice!!
reviews.comment: This app works better than the state lottery sending me text updates, Like the fact that I can just pull up the games I play!
reviews.author: David Nielson

reviews.title: Helpfull App
reviews.comment: Great results untill last night and today. Pulled up to check my #s and get a blank screen. (Freezes Up) Hope this problem clears up soon !
reviews.author: OPSON MAN

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app now all I need is the ability to scan using my smart phone. It would make life easier when I purchase more than a few tickets!
reviews.author: John Mckee

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is a great and handy app to have, if you make it where we could enter our lotto numbers, and get alerts when we win, then I\'ll give this app 5 stars!
reviews.author: Ray Vaughn

reviews.title: Its alright..
reviews.comment: They need to make it to where you can look at past dates itd be a lot better
reviews.author: Mike Vogt

reviews.title: Very fast, and good. ..
reviews.comment: Loving this. ..
reviews.author: Robert E. Baker jr.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Nice...
reviews.author: James Brown

reviews.title: Nice little app
reviews.comment: Answers the big question... did I WIN!
reviews.author: Rodak Lugoman

reviews.title: Gold!
reviews.comment: Cool as ice!
reviews.author: Nathaniel Parham. Jr

reviews.title: App kicks but always on time
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: joseph andreula

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: I run this app on a galaxt tab 2 as well as a galaxy s2 epic and it has been supremely awesone. Has always kept me informed, and as a developer myself, there is nothing I see where I would make any changes.
reviews.author: David Nick

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: very nice
reviews.author: nessy rajic

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Dependable
reviews.author: Jonathan Hill
